front.title: Minimum Requirements for IPv6-only Customer Edge Routers

abstract.t: This document specifies minimum requirements for an IPv6-only Customer Edge (CE) router. Specifically, the current version of this document focuses on the basic provisioning of an IPv6-only CE router and the provisioning of IPv6 hosts attached to it. Neither the provisioning of IPv4 nor downstream routers are in the scope of this document. The document obsoletes RFC 7084.
